headline: Mondelēz International Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend of $0.50 per share
summary: CHICAGO, Dec. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of Mondelēz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.50 per share of Class A common stock. This dividend is payable on January 14, 2026, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on December 31, 2025. About Mondelēz International Mondelēz International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MDLZ) empowers people to snack right in over 150 countries around the world. With 2024 net revenues of approxi
